sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Popover, Steps } from 'antd'; import { Card, Progress, message, Modal, Button, Tooltip, Typography } from 'antd' import { CheckCircleOutlined, LikeOutlined, ExclamationCircleOutlined, SafetyOutlined, SendOutlined, AudioOutlined, CustomerServiceOutlined, SmileOutlined, InfoCircleOutlined, FileProtectOutlined, MessageOutlined, MailOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; const { Title, Paragraph } = Typography const { Step } = Steps; const Dashboard = () => { const content = ( ); return ( IVR Journey <Popover content={content} title="Progress" trigger="hover"> <span style={{ fontSize: '50%', cursor: 'pointer', marginLeft: '0.5%' }}>{ <InfoCircleOutlined /> }</span> </Popover> } /> } /> } /> } /> }/> } /> } /> } /> SMS Journey <span style={{ fontSize: '50%' }}>{ <InfoCircleOutlined /> }</span> } /> } /> } /> } /> }/> } /> } /> } /> E-mail Journey <span style={{ fontSize: '50%' }}>{ <InfoCircleOutlined /> }</span> } /> } /> }/> } /> } /> } /> ) } export default Dashboard // // // // // // // // // //
